00016 struct AbstractSynapseFactory {
00017     virtual void create(const std::list<NeuronInterface *> & preneuron_list, NeuronInterface * const postneuron) = 0;
00018 };

00027 template <class DataConfig, class SynMechConfig, class PlastMechConfig>
00028 class ConcreteSynapseFactory
00029         : public AbstractSynapseFactory
00030 {
00031 public:
00032     typedef typename SynapseTypeMap < typename DataConfig::related_component
00033     , typename SynMechConfig::related_component
00034     , typename PlastMechConfig::related_component
00035     >::created_type
00036     SynapseTypeToCreate;
00037     typedef typename SynMechConfig::related_component SynMechTypeToCreate;
00038 
00039 public:
00040     ConcreteSynapseFactory(DataConfig * const dpcfg, SynMechConfig * const smpcfg, PlastMechConfig * const pmpcfg)
00041             : data_cfg_(dpcfg)
00042             , syn_mech_cfg_(smpcfg)
00043             , plast_mech_cfg_(pmpcfg) {}
00044 
00045     void create(const std::list<NeuronInterface *> & preneuron_list, NeuronInterface * const postneuron) {
00046         // create a new activation synaptic mechanism that will be shared by all the created synapses
00047         SynMechTypeToCreate * syn_mech = new SynMechTypeToCreate(syn_mech_cfg_);
00048         // creation of the synapses, one per preneuron from the list
00049         for (std::list<NeuronInterface *>::const_iterator i = preneuron_list.begin();
00050                 i != preneuron_list.end();
00051                 ++i)
00052             SynapseTypeToCreate * temp = new SynapseTypeToCreate(data_cfg_, syn_mech, plast_mech_cfg_, *i, postneuron);
00053     }
00054 
00055 protected:
00056     DataConfig * const data_cfg_;
00057     SynMechConfig * const syn_mech_cfg_;
00058     PlastMechConfig * const plast_mech_cfg_;
00059 };
00060

00063 // ConcreteSynapseFactory class template specialisation for DataPlastSynapseConfig
00064 template <class SynMechConfig, class PlastMechConfig>
00065 class ConcreteSynapseFactory<DataPlastSynapseConfig, SynMechConfig, PlastMechConfig>
00066         : public AbstractSynapseFactory
00067 {
00068 public:
00069     typedef typename SynapseTypeMap < typename DataPlastSynapseConfig::related_component
00070     , typename SynMechConfig::related_component
00071     , typename PlastMechConfig::related_component
00072     >::created_type
00073     SynapseTypeToCreate;
00074     typedef typename SynMechConfig::related_component SynMechTypeToCreate;
00075 
00076 public:
00077     ConcreteSynapseFactory(DataPlastSynapseConfig * const dpcfg, SynMechConfig * const smpcfg, PlastMechConfig * const pmpcfg)
00078             : data_cfg_(dpcfg)
00079             , syn_mech_cfg_(smpcfg)
00080             , plast_mech_cfg_(pmpcfg) {}
00081 
00082     void create(const std::list<NeuronInterface *> & preneuron_list, NeuronInterface * const postneuron) {
00083         // create a new activation synaptic mechanism that will be shared by all the created synapses
00084         SynMechTypeToCreate * syn_mech = new SynMechTypeToCreate(syn_mech_cfg_);
00085         // creation of the synapses, one per preneuron from the list
00086         for (std::list<NeuronInterface *>::const_iterator i = preneuron_list.begin();
00087                 i != preneuron_list.end();
00088                 ++i) {
00089             data_cfg_->get_spike_list_from_pre_and_postneurons(*i, postneuron);
00090             SynapseTypeToCreate * temp = new SynapseTypeToCreate(data_cfg_, syn_mech, plast_mech_cfg_, *i, postneuron);
00091         }
00092     }
00093 
00094 protected:
00095     DataPlastSynapseConfig * const data_cfg_;
00096     SynMechConfig * const syn_mech_cfg_;
00097     PlastMechConfig * const plast_mech_cfg_;
00098 };
